content.text: I'm doing well, thank you for asking.  How are you?
I'm doing well too, thank you.  What are you up to today?
I'm just relaxing and listening to music.  What about you?
I'm working on a new song.  It's a folk metal song.
That sounds interesting.  I've never heard of folk metal before.
It's a mix of folk music and metal music.  It's a really cool genre.
I'll have to check it out.  I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
You should.  I think you'd like it.
Thanks for the recommendation.  What's your favorite song that you've written so far?
My favorite song is called "The Traveler's Tale."  It's about a traveler who goes on a journey to find himself.
That sounds like a really cool song.  I'd love to hear it sometime.
I'll send you a link to it.  It's on my bandcamp page.
Thanks, I appreciate it.  I'll check it out when I get a chance.
No problem.  I hope you like it.
